title: First day of logging
log: I just deployed the portfolio on vercel, I've had a few days of creating process that is documented. The sketching of the initial idea and the figma designing process are documented and will be added to the portfolio page. There's still a lot to be done, fighting!!

title: Creating About me
log: Between the laundry back and forth and shopping trip with my roommates, I managed to fix some bugs, made part of the "about me" page and added the devlog page
